Edits.Value:
Attached to the Modular Miner.
Increases the power required by the Modular Miner.

Instantly smelts the extracted ores down to their primary metal ingots and ejects Tailings Slurry via the fluid output.
Dirt combusts and becomes Crushed Gangue.
Head Lift: 10 m.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

NOTE: Module is not compatible with Crusher or Fluid Module.
